data.approach: Verifying all 5 child tasks are complete and integrated. Checking welcome screen, CreateProjectDrawer, API endpoints, and documentation.

data.taskTitle: Epic: Project onboarding for new users
summary: ✅ WelcomeScreen.svelte - Complete welcome screen with friendly onboarding UI
✅ CreateProjectDrawer.svelte - Full path picker with directory browser and validation
✅ POST /api/projects/init - Secure bd init endpoint with proper validation
✅ GET /api/directories - Directory listing API with git/beads status
✅ Documentation in CLAUDE.md and install.sh completion message
data.approach: Epic verification - reviewed all 5 child tasks to confirm complete implementation
reviewFocus: Components properly wired in +layout.svelte and projects/+page.svelte
API endpoints follow security best practices (home directory restriction)
Documentation covers both CLI and dashboard approaches

suggestedTasks.title: Add project removal/cleanup in dashboard
suggestedTasks.description: Allow users to remove projects from the dashboard. Should only remove from JAT tracking, not delete the actual .beads directory.
suggestedTasks.reason: Natural follow-up to project onboarding - users may want to clean up old projects

suggestedTasks.title: Add E2E tests for project onboarding flow
suggestedTasks.description: Test the full flow: no projects -> welcome screen -> add project -> CreateProjectDrawer -> success. Should test both manual path entry and directory browser.
suggestedTasks.reason: Onboarding is a critical user flow that should have automated test coverage

patterns: Project drawer opens via openProjectDrawer() from drawerStore
Alt+Shift+P keyboard shortcut opens project drawer
Projects are auto-discovered from ~/code/* with .beads/ directories
gotchas: Path validation has 10-second timeout per fetch - may need adjustment for slow drives
Security: Only paths under home directory are allowed
